entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle and Fog, 1.0°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 97 %

entry.title: Monday: Periods of drizzle or freezing drizzle. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle changing to periods of drizzle in the morning. Fog patches. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to periods of rain in the evening. Snow inland overnight. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm inland. Wind north 20 km/h. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Sunday 15 May 2016
